item.description:
Please join us for a discussion of Chapter 5 of "The Artist's Way" or Chapter 4 of "Finding Water." Chapter 5 is "Recovering a Sense of Possibility," which seems well-matched to this week's breath of Spring.

We'll spend the first half hour reviewing chapter topics, followed by an hour talking in small groups (with at least one group dedicated to "Finding Water"). We'll end with a half hour of general discussion.

Please bring a copy of the book you're following and a pen or pencil. You should read the appropriate book and chapter before coming to the meetup so we can discuss the main topics.

More information on finding either book is on the message board (under the "discussions" tab above).

If you missed a meeting, and would like to review the small group exercises, you can email Heather to request a worksheet.

Information about parking and public transportation near Gallery 263 can also be found on the message board.

**Please note that we are still meeting at 7pm **

If you are able, please bring a $5 donation to the Gallery for the use of their space -- thank you!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will greet you at the door
item.name: Artists Way Cambridge Meetup
